tests.prompt: Create a monster with a melee action (e.g., shortsword). Verify it can attack an adjacent target and deal damage.
Create a monster with a ranged action (e.g., shortbow). Verify it can attack a distant target within range.
Create a boss monster with multiattack. Verify it makes multiple attacks in one turn.
Create a wolf with bite attack. Verify bite can knock target prone on failed STR save.
Monster with TargetClosest selects the nearest enemy.
Monster with TargetLowestHP selects the enemy with lowest current HP.
Monster with TargetLowestAC selects the enemy with lowest AC.
Monster with Pack Tactics gains advantage when ally is adjacent to target.
Zombie with Undead Fortitude can make CON save to stay at 1 HP when dropped to 0.
Skeleton takes double damage from bludgeoning attacks.
Skeleton takes no damage from poison attacks.
NewSkeleton() creates a CR 1/4 skeleton with shortsword, vulnerability to bludgeoning, immunity to poison.
NewZombie() creates a CR 1/4 zombie with slam attack and Undead Fortitude.
NewGhoul() creates a CR 1 ghoul with multiattack (bite + claws) and paralyzing touch.
NewGiantRat() creates a CR 1/8 giant rat with bite and Pack Tactics.
NewWolf() creates a CR 1/4 wolf with bite (knockdown), Pack Tactics, TargetLowestHP.
NewBrownBear() creates a CR 1 brown bear with multiattack (bite + claws).
NewBanditMelee() creates a CR 1/8 bandit with scimitar.
NewBanditRanged() creates a CR 1/8 bandit with light crossbow.
NewThug() creates a CR 1 thug with multiattack and Pack Tactics.
